title: How to access Composition properties on an IPublishedContent object
description: Umbraco's compositions are perfect for creating reusable properties across DocTypes, but how do we access these properties on an IPublishedContent object?

title: Automatically Adding Member Groups to Umbraco Public Access
description: How to automatically add/enforce a Member group on nodes that are set to use group-based Public Access restrictions.

title: How to customise media url paths
description: How to use a custom IMediaPathScheme to change the defaut url route of Media items.

title: Adding Custom database tables to your package
description: How to add custom database tables to your package, using the PackageMigrationPlan class, npoco and running migrations.

title: Umbraco 13 - Rich Text Editor - How to set Ignore User Start Nodes option
description: The 'ignore user start nodes' option is not available on the default Rich Text Editor data type. Here's how to set it via by creating a new one.
